s1.title: Mailing List directions
s1.p: Although Cactus is part of the Jakarta Commons project, it has it's own mailing list, cactus-user.
General information about the jakarta mailing lists can be found here. Please read these guidelines before subscribing or posting to the list.

To subscribe to the list, send an empty message to
cactus-user-subscribe@jakarta.apache.org.

Once you're subscribed, send mail to
cactus-user@jakarta.apache.org to post messages.

All mail sent to cactus-user@jakarta.apache.org is archived
here.
s1.note:
The creation of the Cactus mailing list happened on the 5th of July. Prior to that date all messages were posted on the jakarta-commons mailing list (and even for some time after that date!). You can check the archives of jakarta-commons
here.
